body_html:
"We only support Anaconda packages at the moment. " is somewhat questionable considering that anaconda does not work reliably especially with local (in-house developed) Python packages and installing things via pip and conda will eventually lead to a big mess.

pip install caffe2 throws the same error for me unfortunately. Can someone please help us resolve this please?
body_text:
"We only support Anaconda packages at the moment. " is somewhat questionable considering that anaconda does not work reliably especially with local (in-house developed) Python packages and installing things via pip and conda will eventually lead to a big mess.
pip install caffe2 throws the same error for me unfortunately. Can someone please help us resolve this please?
body:
"We only support Anaconda packages at the moment. " is somewhat questionable considering that anaconda does not work reliably especially with local (in-house developed) Python packages and installing things via pip and conda will eventually lead to a big mess.

`pip install caffe2` throws the same error for me unfortunately. Can someone please help us resolve this please?
